name: Bekko #5
description: Bekko translates literally as ‘Tortoise Shell’. Bekko have a sumi (black) pattern on a coloured base. Koi within the Utsuri and Bekko classes are often confused, but Bekko varieties will always have a clean head with no sumi present. There are three variants of bekko; shiro (white bodied), aka (red bodied), and ki (yellow bodied).
